message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you this amazing product that I think you'll really love. I'm willing to sell it to you for $18000. What do you think?
I'm interested in the product, but $18000 is a bit out of my budget. I was thinking more along the lines of $12000. Can we meet in the middle somewhere?
I understand that $12000 is a bit lower than what I was hoping for, but I'm willing to compromise. How about we meet in the middle at $15000?
I appreciate your willingness to compromise, but $15000 is still a bit too high for me. I'm willing to pay up to $12000, but I'm not sure I can go any higher. Can we meet somewhere in the middle?
